Derby County are closer to a clean bill of health with Paul Warne welcoming Jason Knight back into training at Moor Farm.

articles.author: Sky
articles.title: Iran regime supporters and protesters confront each other ahead of World Cup match against Wales - Sky News
articles.content:
On-going protests in Iran threatened to overshadow the country's second match at the World Cup as pro-regime supporters and anti-government protesters confronted one another ahead of kick-off.

articles.author: Kieran Gill
articles.title: Senegal beat Qatar and Holland draw means hosts are knocked out of World Cup - Daily Mail
articles.description: KIERAN GILL AT THE AL THUMAMA STADUM: Qatar risk being remembered for having the worst hosting team to go with those sparkling steel and glass structures in the desert.
articles.content:
The best stadiums to ever stage a World Cup? Quite possibly. But Qatar could now be remembered for having the worst hosting team to go with those sparkling steel and glass structures in the desert.
